data.name: Vahl
data.description: Allied to a fledgling Phoenix Force and the last Asgardian of their universe, Vahl utilizes Asgardian relics to revive their allies and deal devastating blows to their enemies.

starItems.name: Vahl
starItems.description: Allied to a fledgling Phoenix Force and the last Asgardian of their universe, Vahl utilizes Asgardian relics to revive their allies and deal devastating blows to their enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, always gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, always gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to the primary target

 > Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to the primary target.

+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist and has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to the primary target.
 > When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, always gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage on that Counterattack or Assist.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage and +<color=#86e619>200%</color> extra Focus against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage and +<color=#86e619>200%</color> extra Focus against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Flip an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to negative a effect

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> + flip an additional <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage and +<color=#86e619>200%</color> extra Focus against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> + flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage and +<color=#86e619>200%</color> extra Focus against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> + flip an additional <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> + <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all adjacent targets.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> extra Damage and +<color=#86e619>200%</color> extra Focus against <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> targets.

1.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, revive <color=#86e619>2</color> dead <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, cannot be Blocked, and is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, revive <color=#86e619>2</color> dead <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, cannot be Blocked, and is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color>, and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

3.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color>, and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Steal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Health

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on each enemy.

6.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead Steal <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, Revive <color=#86e619>2</color> dead <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing to all enemies

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color> apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead Steal <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to all allies.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color>, and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

Revive <color=#86e619>2</color> dead allies with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
 > Revive <color=#86e619>2</color> dead <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies with <color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-summoned ally.

On <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally Revive, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the most injured enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> and redistribute to this character + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character.
1.nextUpgrade:
When an enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>10%</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies

2.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-summoned ally.

On <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally Revive, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the most injured enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> and redistribute to this character, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>10%</color>, and clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally Revive, heal that character for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

3.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-summoned ally.

On <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally Revive; apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character, then Heal that character for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this characters Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

3.nextUpgrade:

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when an enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn

On <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> ally Revive, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character, then Heal that character for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this characters Max Health.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the most injured enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> and redistribute to this character, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>10%</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character, and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>BIFROST</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.
